NIA PIA came home last night. i was sad @ first because i didnt think i'd get to see her like all week cuz idk busy gay ass schedules and stuff. but we hung out last night and it was soo sweet. i missed her wicked bad when she was in florida. NIA P. rocks my world!
but yea, today i got kicked off my bus and like im now on a diferent bus and i have to wake up and leave like 25 min earlier than i usually would, but its not just that i have to wake up earlier... i have to walk like a 1/4 mile to get to my damn  bus stop! i hate my bus driver, he really lives up to his name "DICK" man... i dont even know. but yea im gettn my lisencde in 6 days.. pretty STOKED about THAT. but yea im leaving now... love

hey baby! i havnt talked to you in along time!! summer was cool, right. anyways i started school today and like it was cool but im not sure how long im gunna be here and it sux... my dad and my step mom are like fighting and i think there basically divorce bound i mean my step mom and sis just got up and left yesterday and like they took all the shit out of my house and there basically nothing left. except a few crumbs.. some dirt.. a couple dust bunnies and my father. thats right my fasha! anyhooo... my mom and dad have been goin through shit for a while and like when they left they made me pack up all my stuff and like they told me to move with my aunt. which  would b cool i guess but like i dont wanna left shefferd phil. like i dont wanna leave my friends and i DONT wanna leave nia. im sick of all my parents crap and like i dont even know.. i dont know why i like just left my dad or whatever and like im sick of everybody telling me whats best for me. how the hell do they know what im thinking, if they dont listen.. right? i mean everyones saying that they listen to me and that my opinion matters but like in relity it really doesnt because everyones like o youll do fine in another school change and youll make new friends. it will be easy.. how the hell do they know it will be easy to leave? my parents put my through like 4 different schools in the last 2 years. like im not sick of change already? most kids like fear going from middle school to high school.. or changing calsses or some shit.. well no not me.. i have to worry about changing schools for like my 50ith time.. im so sick of it. but im out ill talk to you later 
                       -your sexi homeslice
                        ryan boy #13 # 96

(which sucks ass major!) but yea.. we'll bum rides. or somthin? ideven know. but im out//////// oh yea! all this emo stuff online between like lindsay, nia, krysta, and whoever else.. is gay.. immature.. and pointless, and i dont quite understand how its all my fault? i guess im responcible for YOUR actions? wow thats ghetto im out peace

Yo son.. mhmmmm ... i painted my room today. It's pink, purple, and lavender, and maroon and yellow. It is very pretty, like Rhiannon's eyes. I wrote a wicked pretty love ballad today and I sent it to Ashley H. online.. and then she stopped talking to me. It was so funny. I would've played my guitar along with the love ballad but Jimi B, Kenny, and like 300 hndred other people trashed the shit out of it. Yeah.. Kenny punched it in half, it was so nuts. Yeah, approxiamtely two weeks until I start work with ThunderGuillermo and Jimi B. We're moving to Connecticut to go plow tobacco fields. It's gon' be slave labor. I drank lemonade and it made my throat burn.. and it made me feel like I was going to die- it felt like battery acid. Speaking of drinking, I was accused of drinking at school today because I was carrying my guitar and fell on it in the hall. Mr. Kelly said I was, "Under the influence" so I went down to Nurse Gould's office where I stayed for like an hour. I missed first period and then I was threatened to not tell anybody else or something bad would happen.. And then later at lunch, I threw a hot dog across the cafeteria and hit some faggot girl in the back of the head, good times. And of course, Mr. O'Brian came over and yelled at me first. Whenever something bad happens, it's always my fault. .. But the whole table denied me throwing it, so no one got in trouble. Yesterday Kenny, JImi B and myself brought exlax into school. We filled up a fruit2o bottle with it and got Jordan Lemay, Brian, and 40 other people to swig from the bottle of no returb. I guess we have dud shit juice because it didn't work and no one shit their pants. And that's all I can think of.. Oh, and I painted my room, again. The end.

Ryan
